alert.alert_msg: Due to COVID-19, there may be changes to when, where and how you vote in your upcoming elections. Check with your state election site for more information.
alert.alert_after_election: For official election results, go to your state election website.

banner.banner_text: An official website of the United States government
banner.guidance_gov_part_2: website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.
banner.guidance_https_part_4: means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
